title: Create a Contract Summary
description: A business executive needs a one-page summary of a long, complex contract, highlighting the key business terms.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the full text of the agreement.

tasks.description: Identify and extract the key business terms, such as the contract term, payment obligations, termination rights, and liability caps.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent extracts the most important clauses for a business user.

tasks.description: Draft a concise, one-page summary in plain English, avoiding legal jargon.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a clear and easy-to-understand summary for the executive.
